summary: This is an email from a Federal Bureau of Prisons staff member at MCC New York, dated August 5, 2019, regarding a revised August visiting schedule for the facility. The email includes a poignant quote from R.N. Sin, suggesting a complaint or observation about treatment.

persons.name: Mrs. Captain's Secretary
persons.context: Sender of the email regarding the revised August visiting schedule at MCC New York.

persons.name: R.N. Sin
persons.context: Source of a quoted statement about being treated like nothing, included in the email signature or body.

events.title: Revised Visiting Schedule Issued
events.description: A revised August visiting schedule for MCC New York was issued via email due to an identified issue with the original schedule.

keyFacts: The document is an internal Bureau of Prisons email dated August 5, 2019, concerning administrative procedures at MCC New York.
It indicates a revision to the August visiting schedule was necessary due to an identified issue with the original.
The email includes a quote from R.N. Sin: 'She's, everything, event, when they treated like nothing,' which may reflect a grievance or observation about treatment within the facility.
